Key.value: You can craft various drugs to improve your characteristics and restore resources. For work you require a chemist workbench.
enables craft of Tier 1 items
enables craft of Tier 2 items
enables craft of Tier 3 items
Increases proc chance of crafting items
Reduces crafting time by 2 seconds. Reduces chance of failure to 4%.
Grants chance to craft 4 items. Reduces chance of failure to 3%.
Reduces crafting time by an additional 2 seconds. Reduces chance of failure to 2%.
Reduces chance of failure to 1%.
Grants chance to craft 10 items. Reduces crafting time by an additional 2 seconds. Failure is impossible. Consumable effects persist after death.

Mana cost - <color=#FFFFFF>100%</color> maximum <size=100%><sprite="TooltipIcons" name="Mana" color=#00A3FF></size><color=#00A3FF>Mana</color>. Activated lock - stops the growth/decrease in the efficiency of professions. Spend <color=#FFFFFF>{0}</color> <size=100%><sprite="coin_gold" index=0></size><color=#F2BF52>Gold</color> for each craft.
Deactivate the efficiency lock to start receiving profession efficiency and stop spending <color=#F2BF52>Gold</color> on crafting.
You can craft various artifacts to improve your characteristics. For work you require a constructor workbench.
enables craft of Tier 1 items
enables craft of Tier 2 items
enables craft of Tier 3 items
Increases proc chance of crafting items
Reduces crafting time by 2 seconds. Reduces chance of failure to 4%.
Grants chance to craft <color=#01A0DA>Rare</color> items. Reduces chance of failure to 3%.

Reduces chance of failure to 1%.
Grants chance to craft <color=#BB4BB1>Epic</color> items. Reduces crafting time by an additional 2 seconds. Failure is impossible. Crafted items bind when equipped.

You can rip and process animal skins needed for all creating professions. For work you require a flayer workbench.
enables gathering of Tier 1 veins
enables gathering of Tier 2 veins
enables gathering of Tier 3 veins
Increases proc chance of harvesting resources
Reduces butchering time by 2 seconds. Reduces chance of failure to 4%.
Grants chance to gather <color=#01A0DA>Rare</color> resources. Grants 2 gathering attempts per carcass. Reduces chance of failure to 3%.
Reduces butchering time by an additional 2 seconds. Reduces chance of failure to 2%.
Grants 3 gathering attempts per carcass. Reduces chance of failure to 1%.
Grants chance to gather <color=#BB4BB1>Epic</color> resources. Reduces butchering time by an additional 2 seconds. Failure is impossible.

Mana cost - <color=#FFFFFF>100%</color> maximum <size=100%><sprite="TooltipIcons" name="Mana" color=#00A3FF></size><color=#00A3FF>Mana</color>. Activated lock - stops the growth/decrease in the efficiency of professions. Consume <color=#FFFFFF>{0}</color> <size=100%><sprite="TooltipIcons" name="Mana" color=#00A3FF></size><color=#00A3FF>Mana</color> each time you start gathering.
Deactivate the efficiency lock to start receiving profession efficiency and stop spending <color=#00A3FF>Mana</color> on gathering.
